SENT.plain: Cytogenetic analysis provides valuable prognostic information in children diagnosed with hematologic malignancies

While the t(4;11)(q21;q23) has frequently been reported in patients with acute lymphoblastic leukemia, the additional involvement of chromosome 13 to form a three-way translocation has not been described previously
We report a case of acute lymphoblastic leukemia in a 5-month old infant with a complex t(4;11;13)(q21;q23;q12-14)
